item.title: The Breville Oracle Touch is down 37% for Click Frenzy, but you’ll need to act fast to snap up these savings
item.description: The Breville Oracle Touch is one seriously talented bean-to-cup espresso machine, and it's now had over AU$1,300 slashed from its price in this early Black Friday deal.

item.title: Red Bull Racing’s secret weapon? An engineer who treats workflows like lap times
item.description: Lauren Mekies spent much of his career in the engineering trenches. His approach to winning reflects that technical background, too.
